title: Be Disruptive
description:
Swagu and Perk talk about why Ja Morant should be in the MVP conversation, why the Bulls should have two All-Star starters, the criticism of players opting out of bowl games, LeBron wanting to share the floor with Bronny, and the rise of Rich Paul.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
